alert.note: Alert for Bradford; Central Marion; Coastal Duval; Coastal St. Johns; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Clay; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Inland St. Johns; South Central Duval; Western Alachua; Western Clay; Western Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 12 at 7:38AM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Bradford, eastern Alachua, west central St. Johns, Marion, northwestern Putnam, Clay and southern Duval Counties through 830 AM EST... At 737 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Kingsley to 12 miles northwest of Crystal River Airport. Movement was northeast at 60 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Ocala, Green Cove Springs, Starke, Rainbow Lakes Estates, Interlachen, Keystone Heights, Citra, Melrose, Fruit Cove and Fort McCoy. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1100 AM EST for northern and northeastern Florida.
